theForsaken:BlessedWeapon.NAME: Blessed Weapon
theForsaken:BlessedWeapon.DESCRIPTION: Your next attack deals 50% more damage.
theForsaken:BlessedWeapon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your next !M! attacks deal 50% more damage.

theForsaken:CleansingLight.NAME: Cleansing Light
theForsaken:CleansingLight.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Remove theforsaken:Fear, Poison, and Vulnerable.

theForsaken:CorruptedForm.NAME: Corrupted Form
theForsaken:CorruptedForm.DESCRIPTION: Reduce damage taken by one third. Convert all HP lost to poison.
theForsaken:CorruptedForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Reduce damage taken by half. Convert all HP lost to poison.

theForsaken:CorruptedWord.NAME: Corrupted Word
theForsaken:CorruptedWord.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! poison to ALL enemies AND yourself.

theForsaken:DarkRift.NAME: Dark Rift
theForsaken:DarkRift.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies AND yourself. Next turn, heal each twice as much.

theForsaken:Eulogy.NAME: Eulogy
theForsaken:Eulogy.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Apply !M! vulnerability to ALL enemies. NL theforsaken:Unplayed: Your next attack deals 3 bonus damage.

theForsaken:FatRoll.NAME: Fat Roll
theForsaken:FatRoll.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL theforsaken:Unplayed: Draw an additional card next turn.

theForsaken:HorrifyingStrike.NAME: Horrifying Strike
theForsaken:HorrifyingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Inflict !M! theforsaken:Fear on yourself.

theForsaken:InspiringBlow.NAME: Inspiring Blow
theForsaken:InspiringBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL If this kills an enemy gain !M! block each turn.

theForsaken:Penitence.NAME: Penitence
theForsaken:Penitence.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Your next attack deals !M! bonus damage.

theForsaken:Purification.NAME: Purification
theForsaken:Purification.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Transfer your debuffs to the target.

theForsaken:RainingSunlight.NAME: Raining Sunlight
theForsaken:RainingSunlight.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL theforsaken:Unplayed: Your next attack deals !M! bonus damage.

theForsaken:Retribution.NAME: Retribution
theForsaken:Retribution.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Reflect all incoming damage this turn. NL theforsaken:Unplayed: Reflect !M! damage when attacked.

theForsaken:Riposte.NAME: Riposte
theForsaken:Riposte.DESCRIPTION: When your block is broken, your attacks deal double damage next turn.

theForsaken:SacredOath.NAME: Sacred Oath
theForsaken:SacredOath.DESCRIPTION: Double your Strength and Dexterity. NL Exhaust.
theForsaken:SacredOath.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Triple your Strength and Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

theForsaken:SacrificeSoul.NAME: Sacrifice Soul
theForsaken:SacrificeSoul.DESCRIPTION: Sacrifice all your buffs, dealing !D! damage, + !M! for each buff to ALL enemies. NL ( !theForsaken:SACRIFICE_SOUL_DAMAGE! damage) NL Exhaust.

theForsaken:ShieldBash.NAME: Shield Bash
theForsaken:ShieldBash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! Damage. Increase the power of ALL Shield Bash cards by !M! this combat.

theForsaken:SpinAttack.NAME: Spin Attack
theForsaken:SpinAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Repeat for each dexterity.

theForsaken:WrathOfGod.NAME: Wrath of God
theForsaken:WrathOfGod.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage and gain !B! Block X times. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.
